channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for GA

DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Qa clean up the spill hazmat taking over to the waste area to be process. 2. X-2023071160 SequenceEvent: Qa was call over to unload due to a leaking hazmat. DescribePack: The hazmat top was loose causing the liquid to spill. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Qa clean up the spill place hazmat inside a red tote to be taking over hazmat area to be process.
